name: clairvoyantly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that seems to involve seeing the future, or seeing things that other people cannot see : Closing my eyes to listen to him, I was surprised to clairvoyantly see some spirits standing with us. He asked a woman in the audience to try, clairvoyantly, to perceive the images on a set of cards that he was holding. He almost clairvoyantly predicts stock market crashes.
More examplesFewer examplesI clairvoyantly saw the spirit of a powerful soldier knight. The medium sees the face of the spirit clairvoyantly and paints it on the canvas.
